law.catch_line: The following property is subject to seizure and forfeiture:...
law.text:
The following property is subject to seizure and forfeiture:
a handgun worn, carried, or transported in violation of § 4-203 or § 4-204 of the Criminal Law Article or sold, rented, transferred, or possessed in violation of § 5-103, § 5-104, § 5-118, § 5-119, § 5-120, § 5-121, § 5-122, § 5-123, § 5-124, § 5-125, § 5-126, § 5-127, § 5-128, § 5-129, § 5-133(a), (b), and (d), § 5-134, or § 5-136 of the Public Safety Article; and
ammunition, handgun parts, or handgun appurtenances that are:
worn, carried, or transported in violation of § 4-203 or § 4-204 of the Criminal Law Article; or
found in the immediate vicinity of a handgun worn, carried, or transported in violation of § 4-203 or § 4-204 of the Criminal Law Article.
